entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
